name: Bad Batch
description:
Summary

You've just been hired as the new magical item quality assurance manager for a weapon factory. You need to make sure that only the highest quality magic items are approved, some days different gems will be cursed and you'll need to make sure none of them get past. Other times customers will have custom requests for you.

Be careful we wouldn't want anyone accidentally freezing themself with a cursed ice dagger now would we?

Controls

A to deny items

D to accept items

Tab to open your notes
